subtitleNullable: Keypoints of hand gestures - Numbers, Shaka, Vulcan salute and many more
descriptionNullable:
This dataset has been created using the [OpenHand application](https://github.com/ArthurFDLR/OpenHand-App) which runs on the excellent full-body pose estimator OpenPose from the CMU Perceptual Computing Lab. Once you have built and trained a model, [it can be deployed in the application](https://github.com/ArthurFDLR/OpenHand-App#pose-classifier-models) for further testing and experimentation.

![OpenHand-App visual](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ArthurFDLR/OpenHand-App/master/.github/markdown/OpenHand_snap.png)
title: OpenHand: Hand gesture recognition
subtitle: Keypoints of hand gestures - Numbers, Shaka, Vulcan salute and many more
description:
This dataset has been created using the [OpenHand application](https://github.com/ArthurFDLR/OpenHand-App) which runs on the excellent full-body pose estimator OpenPose from the CMU Perceptual Computing Lab. Once you have built and trained a model, [it can be deployed in the application](https://github.com/ArthurFDLR/OpenHand-App#pose-classifier-models) for further testing and experimentation.

![OpenHand-App visual](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ArthurFDLR/OpenHand-App/master/.github/markdown/OpenHand_snap.png)
